testcase.title: Change language on DII Compound Search and make sure it is sticky across WoS pages

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: page "Compound Search" is displayed in language "Korean"
I perform search by field "Standardized Molecular Formula" with query "H5 N Si" on page "Compound Search"
page "Compound Results" is displayed in language "Korean"
I add page to 'Marked List' on page 'DII Compound Results'
I access page "Derwent Compounds Marked List"
page "Derwent Compounds Marked List" is displayed in language "Korean"

testcase.title: Change language on Results Summary and make sure it is sticky across WoS pages

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I sign in with account login "wostesting52@gmail.com" and password "wostesting@52"

substeps.message: First selected option for dropDown Search Fields (row 1) is defined.
dropDown Search Fields (row 1)  Author option is selected.
Text of textInput Search Term (row 0) is .
Text of textInput Search Term (row 0) is Smith.
textInput Search Term (row 0)  'Smith' text was entered.

steps.title: I perform search by field "Author" with query "Smith" on page "Basic Search"
page "Results Summary" is displayed in language "Japanese"
page "My Settings" is displayed in language "Japanese"
I access page "Saved Searches and Alerts"
page "Saved Searches and Alerts" is displayed in language "Japanese"
page "Results Analysis" is displayed in language "Japanese"
